column4: I just deleted Ubuntu from my system, but GRUB remains as the bootloader and keeps giving me Error 17 or 21.  I don't have a Windows installation cd as my computer has a builtin recovery drive (which I can't access because of GRUB).  Could anyone help?
the instructions your computer manufacturer gave you for recovering should still work
I'm unable to boot into my recovery drive because of GRUB (or rather, what remains of GRUB.  I would assume it would still let me boot into windows if it was all there.)
yeah, you need a windows disk to reinstall the windows bootloader
